title: Red Pepper and Sweetcorn Quinoa
ingredients: ['170g quinoa', '700ml water', '1 pinch salt', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '75g sweetcorn kernels', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 spring onions, chopped']
